title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-4.2 - Large carpets and rugs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-4.2 - Large carpets and rugs

State Regulations

Any large carpet or rug shall be deemed highly flammable
and dangerous if it fails to meet the standard contained in Appendix F-3 of
this Part (Standard for the Surface Flammability of Carpets and Rugs, DOC FF
1-70, issued by the U. S. Secretary of Commerce). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
80-4.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
